title: Garage, Pantry & Mudrooms
intro: Heavy-duty storage for garages and chef-worthy organization for pantries. Keep utility spaces tidy and functional.
highlights: Slat wall systems for bikes, tools, and ladders
Pantry shelves designed for small appliances and bulk goods
Mudroom lockers and drop zones for busy families

avgCost.notes: Garage systems vary by linear footage. Pantries can range from simple wire upgrades to full cabinetry.

faqs.a: Many professionals offer weather-resistant materials designed for Texas garages. Discuss climate considerations with your chosen provider to ensure the best solution for your space.

faqs.q: Can pros organize a small pantry?
faqs.a: Absolutely. Designers use corner shelves, door racks, and vertical dividers to triple the usable space in small reach-in pantries.
